data.title: Local eggs near Council Bluffs, IA
data.meta_description: Find eggs and more from local farms, farmers' markets, CSAs, farm stands, and u-pick farms near Council Bluffs, IA
data.text:
Our certified organic farm is located in the Iowa Loess Hills across the Missouri River from Omaha. We grow heirloom vegetables on 7 acres on our grandfather's farm. In addition to outdoor garden fields, Iowana Farm has 4 high tunnel structures and a culinary herb house. more...

Wenninghoff's Farm is a family run farm growing a wide variety of locally grown produce for over 60 years. Customers come to the farm to purchase our huge selections of mouth-watering sweet corn, black diamond watermelon, super sweet peaches and tons of other vegetables. more...

My husband has turned into a farmer. Small-scale, let's be real. This happened quite suddenly and no one was more surprised than me. He had this idea he wanted to start a garden and teach our kids about growing food. This became a very large garden, more than we needed for just ourselves! more...

Koelzer Farms is a family owned Produce and Christmas Tree Farm. Our passion is growing heirloom fruit and vegetable varieties to share. Although we aren't Certified Organic, we utilize as many organic farming practices as feasible. Christmas trees are available for pre-tagging beginning in October. more...

Welcome to River City Farmers Market in Council Bluffs, Iowa. We were established in 1976, and now located at the Omni Center at 300 West Broadway. We will begin operations on Saturday, Memorial Day weekend and sell through the 2nd week of October. Hours of operation is 7:00 A.M. until Noon. more...

The Omaha Community Bicycle Shop is located at 525 Webster Street, very close to 33rd and California Street and only two miles west of downtown Omaha. All proceeds coming from produce sales will be put into the community bicycle shop. Durring the growing months we grow a wide selection of seasonal vegetables, herbs, cut flowers and a few fruits. more...

Pemberley Farms was established in the fall of 2013. The small farm was located just north of Dodge City, KS. However, beginning in January of 2016 we are in the process of moving to Omaha, NE. While eggs can still be purchased in Dodge City all produce will be sold in Omaha. more...

The Florence Mill Farmers Market is Omaha's only market situated outside and inside a historic agricultural-site, with an adjoining field too. Besides fresh, local produce and crafts, it is a perfect location for a family-friendly, fun, country-market. Each Sunday: Live music and "Country-School" educational presenters. more...

Benson Farmers Market is located in the historic downtown Benson neighborhood of Omaha, Nebraska. It was started in 2008 to help the area grow and prosper. We are sincerely committed to a sense of community and thus wanted to support the local efforts toward that end. Can the market change the world in some small way by what we eat? more...

The Farmers Market is located in Washington Park on Franklin Street at West 20th Avenue. The hours are 8:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. every Saturday From May to September. The market may be extended based on the growing season. The 2018 kick-off is scheduled for May 26th. more...

Sustainable and regenerative farming, getting back to a simpler, healthier way of farming. Knowing where our food comes from and what exactly is in it is one of the most important things for our family, and we believe it should be at the top of your list as well. That's why we believe transparency is the best practice we can have. more...

We farm for food justice. We desire to see healing brought to our local economy through local food production. Our motto is "when you pick the grapes from the grapevine, only pick it once; Leave the rest for the stranger, the fatherless and the widow." Our living practice is hospitality to those in need. more...

Located in the south parking area of Omaha's Village Pointe Shopping Center, this is a growers market. There are no arts & crafts or processed foods. All foods are sourced locally and emphasis is on family farms and sustainable agriculture. Seasonal produce, pastured and grass-fed meats, including lamb, pork, beef and poultry. more...

Our farm has been family owned for over 40 years. In 2013 we transitioned into raising beef and lamb. We are dedicated to raising beef and lamb in as natural a habitat as we can give them. We use a rotational grazing system so that our animals will get the healthiest grass we can give them. more...

We are a family owned and operated wood-fired brick oven bakery and farm specializing in naturally leavened varieties of breads and pastries. Because we're a small homestead, as well, we'll have fruits, eggs and jams/jellies from time to time. CSB (community-supported bakery) is available at 4, 12, and 52-loaf levels. more...

When we bought our farm in fall of 2014 we had one goal in mind; to feed our family, friends and neighbors the most nutrient dense, chemical free, and naturally raised food we can. We raise heritage breeds of animals and vegetables that, while taking longer to raise, have the most amazing flavor! more...

We have been in business since 1997. We grow using bio-dynamic growing methods. Our crops are fed to our livestock. Their by-product is composted and incorporated back into our land. All of our produce and animals are produced in accordance with the organic standards. more...

We're a small family-run farm, committed to producing high quality products while focusing on sustainability. Our goats milk soap and our love for this amazing product is the center of our business and where we started. more...

We are a collaborative CSA located in and around Carson, Iowa. All the farmers involved are committed to producing nutritious vegetables grown using organic methods. We have years of no-nonsense vegetable growing experience and are involved in local markets in our area. more...

Botna Burrow is a diverse, small-scale farm nestled on the edge of Hancock, Iowa. We use organic growing practices and produce high-quality vegetables and herbs. We care about our soil, land, and all the living things that inhabit it. We have a special interest in native plants and edible perennials and will nurture both on our land. more...

Established in 2007, the Riverside Farmers Market is located in rural East Pottawattamie County and serves the communities of: Oakland, Carson, Macedonia, Avoca, Hancock, and Walnut. The market runs on Wednesday afternoons 3:00PM to 6:00PM June to October. more...

Von Weihe Farms Produce is a small farm business located in Eastern Pottawattamie County, Iowa. We are a sustainable farm growing 1.5 acres of produce and 1.5 acres of small fruit including grapes, raspberries, and strawberries. In 2011, we will be selling produce at the Downtown Omaha Farmers Market as well as several others in the area. more...
